doc:
Lou Vernon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lou_Vernon 0 Lou Vernon (26 June 1888, Brisbane – 22 December 1971, Sydney) was a popular Australian actor of stage, radio and screen and producer. He started his career in musical comedy, and was particularly noted for his versatility and ability as a character actor. He had a son Ross Vernon, who was in the RAAF, after abandoning a radio career. Lou_Vernon ( 26_June_1888 , Brisbane – 22_December_1971 , Sydney ) was a_popular_Australian_actor of stage_,_radio_and_screen_and_producer . He started his_career in musical_comedy , and was_particularly_noted for his_versatility_and_ability as a_character_actor . He had a_son_Ross_Vernon , who was in the_RAAF , after abandoning a_radio_career .
